content: this legal text summarizes a court case that took place in parma on march 4 2013 the details of the case are not provided but it involves two parties the court has made a final decision regarding the division of community property between the parties party pe is granted full ownership of a property located at number 41a soragna valued at €2490455 party pe li and heirs ci el ci da are granted full ownership of a property located at soragna via cavour valued at €10899996 the court also authorizes the withdrawal of assigned sums from various bank accounts to compensate the parties the costs of the legal proceedings will be fully compensated the decision was made on march 13 2013 and filed on april 3 2013
